product_name: Scarpa Rebel Pro GTX Mountaineering Boots
long_description: Designed with Scarpa athlete and professional climber Ueli Steck, the waterproof Scarpa Rebel Pro GTX Mountaineering Boots offer light weight and high performance on rock, snow, ice or mixed terrain. GORE-TEX(R) Insulated Comfort waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and warm. Vibram(R) Mulaz S outsoles have grippy rubber and deep lugs for excellent traction on rough trails. Low-volume alpine last allows the boots to have an extremely precise, almost rock shoe-like fit. Triple-density polyurethane midsoles absorb shock. Flexible cuffs allow great range of motion and comfort around your ankles. Low-profile tongues are made with stretch GORE-TEX for an excellent low-bulk fit. Scarpa Rebel Pro GTX Mountaineering Boots are compatible with step-in crampons (sold separately).
short_description: Designed with Scarpa athlete and professional climber Ueli Steck, the waterproof Scarpa Rebel Pro GTX Mountaineering Boots offer light weight and high performance on rock, snow, ice or mixed terrain.
